comments.body: That indicates that if banks wish to decebtralize the system by investing in Bitcoin for future gain, why are we putting our money in those banks to use for their investment rather than directly investing in Bitcoin?The banking system is advantageous for bankers because customers save money in their accounts, which bankers then use for future business.
